Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.client.view.cli

Class CliViewUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.client.view.ViewUpdate
      • it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.client.view.cli.CliViewUpdate
  • public class CliViewUpdate
extends ViewUpdate
    This is the class that contains all the methods used in the command line interface

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CliViewUpdate()
      Standard constructor, just init the console variable
      CliViewUpdate​(java.io.BufferedReader console)
      Used for testing, can redirect the console input
